paper_abstract: In this paper, we show with a counterexample, that the method proposed by Sedeno-Noda and Gonzalez-Martin for the biobjective integer minimum flow problem is not able to find all efficient integer points in objective space. (c) 2004 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The biobjective integer minimum cost flow problem-incorrectness of Sedeno-Noda and Gonzalez-Martin's algorithm
